title: Ep. 47 :: Why QE2 May Not Be Great For Stocks
itunes:title: Why QE2 May Not Be Great For Stocks
description: Chris Mayer, editor of the Capital and Crisis newsletter, talks value investing, China and QE2. Stephanie Link, Director of Research, for TheStreet.com tells us what conference calls you should be listening to during earnings season.
content:encoded: Chris Mayer, editor of the Capital and Crisis newsletter, talks value investing, China and QE2. Stephanie Link, Director of Research, for TheStreet.com tells us what conference calls you should be listening to during earnings season.
